name: backend
description: Habit Tracker Backend API - Express.js REST API with MongoDB Atlas database, JWT authentication, and bcrypt password hashing. Provides endpoints for user management, habit CRUD operations, daily check-ins, and login tracking.
author: John Denis Nyagah

_comments.type: ES6 modules enabled - allows import/export syntax instead of require()

dependencies.express: Web server framework - handles HTTP requests, routing, and middleware
dependencies.mongoose: MongoDB ODM (Object Data Modeling) - connects to MongoDB Atlas and defines schemas
dependencies.bcrypt: Password hashing library - securely hashes passwords before storing (10 salt rounds)
dependencies.jsonwebtoken: JWT token generation and verification - handles user authentication
dependencies.cors: Cross-Origin Resource Sharing - allows frontend (different port) to access backend API
dependencies.dotenv: Environment variables loader - reads .env file for sensitive configuration (MONGO_URI, JWT_SECRET)

scripts.start: Production mode - runs server with node (use this for deployment)
scripts.dev: Development mode - auto-restarts server on file changes (requires nodemon installed globally)
